['1. Find the book and place it on the coffee table in the home office.', '2. Prepare a cup of hot m

# Define a behavior to find the book and place it on the coffee table in the home office
behavior __goal__():
    body:
        # Bind an item that is identified as a book
        bind book: item where:
            is_book(book)
        
        # Bind an item identified as the home office
        bind home_office: item where:
            is_home_office(home_office)
        
        # Use a function to specify that a book should be placed on a coffee table, which should be 
within the home office
        if exists table: item : is_coffee_table(table) and inside(table, home_office):
            # If theres a coffee table in the home office, it is selected
            bind table: item where:
                is_coffee_table(table) and inside(table, home_office)
            # Place the selected book on the coffee table in the home office
            achieve on(book, table)
        else:
            # If no coffee table is found, observe the items in the home office to locate one
            observe(home_office, "Check if there is a coffee table in the home office")

Goal Representation:
behavior prepare_hot_milk(cup:item, stove:item, milk:item):
    body:
        assert is_cup(cup) and is_stove(stove) and is_milk(milk)
        achieve inside(milk, cup) # Pour milk into cup
        achieve close(milk, stove) # Place milkfilled cup close to stove
        achieve is_on(stove) # Turn on the stove to heat milk
        achieve is_off(stove) # Turn off the stove once milk is heated

behavior place_on_table(cup:item, table:item):
    body:
        achieve on(cup, table) # Place the cup on the coffee table

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cup: item where:
            is_cup(cup)
        bind milk: item where:
            is_milk(milk)
        bind stove: item where:
            is_stove(stove)
        bind coffee_table: item where:
            is_coffee_table(coffee_table)
        prepare_hot_milk(cup, stove, milk)
        place_on_table(cup, coffee_table)

behavior prepare_hot_milk(milk:item, cup:item):
    body:
        achieve has_water(milk)
        achieve_once inhand(cup)
        achieve inside(milk, cup)

behavior place_on_table(milk:item, table:item):
    body:
        achieve on(milk, table)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind milk: item where:
            is_milk(milk)
        bind cup: item where:
            is_cup(cup)
        bind coffee_table: item where:
            is_coffee_table(coffee_table)
        
        prepare_hot_milk(milk, cup)
        place_on_table(milk, coffee_table)
